sentences.sContent: More than 99% of all human deaths from rabies occur in Africa and Asia.
sentences.sContent_eng: More than 99% of all human deaths from rabies occur in Africa and Asia.
sentences.sCn: 狂犬病造成的所有人类死亡中，有99%以上发生在非洲和亚洲。

sentences.sContent: Therefore, prompt local treatment of all bite wounds and scratches that may be contaminated with rabies virus is important.
sentences.sContent_eng: Therefore, prompt local treatment of all bite wounds and scratches that may be contaminated with rabies virus is important.
sentences.sCn: 因此，迅速对可能已感染狂犬病毒的所有咬伤处和抓伤处进行局部处理很重要。

sentences.sContent: Becky found a wolf in the oak stump near the wash.I think it has rabies.
sentences.sContent_eng: Becky found a wolf in the oak stump near the wash.I think it has rabies.
sentences.sCn: 贝基在干河床附近的栎树墩发现一只狼。 我想它有狂犬病。

trans.tranOther: a very dangerous disease that affects dogs and other animals, and that you can catch if you are bitten by an infected animal
